Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 30/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
